summary: HAdVs were detected in 72 (5.64%) of the 1276 NPA specimens. HAdV-B3 (56.06%, 37/66) and HAdV-C2 (19.70%, 13/66) were the most frequent. the log number of viral load ranged from 3.30 to 9.14 copies per mL. -C circulated simultaneously among the hospitalized children with RTIs in Beijing. HAdV-B type 3 and HAdV-C type 2 most frequent.
